title: Raj Kumar Chakraverty
text:
Raj Kumar Chakraverty was a Member of the <a href="List%20of%20members%20of%20the%201st%20National%20Assembly%20of%20Pakistan">1st National Assembly of Pakistan</a> as a representative of <a href="East%20Pakistan">East Pakistan</a>.
Career.
Chakraverty was a Member of the Constituent Assembly of Pakistan. He spoke in the assembly for a secular constitution in Pakistan.
